name: Sea Of Legends
description:
Sea Of Legends is an Open World Action RPG Adventure game. This game enables you to be free in a world where you can do anything you want.

Features:

- Open World, Travel by Ship with your Crew anywhere!

- Wanted Board, Wanted Posters are added in updates with new Captains to hunt down and kill for their bounty!

- Bounty System, once you kill a Captain you will be able to sell their head for their bounty!

- Story Line, a main story line is added into the game if you so wish to play it!

- Gathering, you will be able to gather resources throughout the world!

- Trading, you will be able to trade through Town to Town gaining plunder and gold!

- Crafting, not available at this time as we have not yet finished this feature!

- Jobs, earn gold from doing jobs or side quests by talking to people around Town!

- Crew Members, you will be able to hire people to join your crew!

- Dungeons, random dungeons or arenas will be available around the world!

Questions/Information:

Vote for us on Steam Greenlight: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=620660743
